name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Identifies a Contract Valued Item instance.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identifies a Contract Valued Item instance.

name: $effectiveTime
desc: Returns: Indicates the time during which this Contract ValuedItem information is effective.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates the time during which this Contract ValuedItem information is effective.

name: $quantity
desc: Returns: Specifies the units by which the Contract Valued Item is measured or counted, and quantifies the countable or measurable Contract Valued Item instances.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Specifies the units by which the Contract Valued Item is measured or counted, and quantifies the countable or measurable Contract Valued Item instances.

name: $unitPrice
desc: Returns: A Contract Valued Item unit valuation measure.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A Contract Valued Item unit valuation measure.

name: $factor
desc: Returns: A real number that represents a multiplier used in determining the overall value of the Contract Valued Item delivered. The concept of a Factor allows for a discount or surcharge multiplier to be applied to a monetary amount.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A real number that represents a multiplier used in determining the overall value of the Contract Valued Item delivered. The concept of a Factor allows for a discount or surcharge multiplier to be applied to a monetary amount.

name: $points
desc: Returns: An amount that expresses the weighting (based on difficulty, cost and/or resource intensiveness) associated with the Contract Valued Item delivered. The concept of Points allows for assignment of point values for a Contract Valued Item, such that a monetary amount can be assigned to each point.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An amount that expresses the weighting (based on difficulty, cost and/or resource intensiveness) associated with the Contract Valued Item delivered. The concept of Points allows for assignment of point values for a Contract Valued Item, such that a moneta

name: $net
desc: Returns: Expresses the product of the Contract Valued Item unitQuantity and the unitPriceAmt. For example, the formula: unit Quantity * unit Price (Cost per Point) * factor Number  * points = net Amount. Quantity, factor and points are assumed to be 1 if not supplied.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Expresses the product of the Contract Valued Item unitQuantity and the unitPriceAmt. For example, the formula: unit Quantity * unit Price (Cost per Point) * factor Number  * points = net Amount. Quantity, factor and points are assumed to be 1 if not suppl

name: $linkId
desc: Returns: Id  of the clause or question text related to the context of this valuedItem in the referenced form or QuestionnaireResponse.

name: $addlinkId
desc: Id  of the clause or question text related to the context of this valuedItem in the referenced form or QuestionnaireResponse.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Id  of the clause or question text related to the context of this valuedItem in the referenced form or QuestionnaireResponse.

name: $securityLabelNumber
desc: Returns: A set of security labels that define which terms are controlled by this condition.

name: $addsecurityLabelNumber
desc: A set of security labels that define which terms are controlled by this condition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A set of security labels that define which terms are controlled by this condition.
